# openstatus

OpenStatus is an open-source status page platform with global monitoring (HTTP, TCP, DNS).

## Features

- Uptime Monitoring: Monitor the availability and performance of your services globally.
- Status Page: Create a custom status page to display the status of your services.
- Monitoring as Code: Define your monitoring checks using YAML.
- Alerting: Configure email, Slack, or other notification channels for alerts.
- CLI: Manage openstatus using a command-line interface.
- SDK: Integrate openstatus into your applications with our [SDK](https://jsr.io/@openstatus/sdk-node).
